summary: arm64: dts: qcom: sc8280xp: fix UFS DMA coherency
details:
arm64: dts: qcom: sc8280xp: fix UFS DMA coherency

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.18 by commit 981baab92a78ac46f7a307d190af6ec9e7f5fb22, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 152d1faf1e2f32cfb1956c7e5e42e8cb2c95ff18. For more details please see the references link.
